**Regarding UOB One***Sorry  I just watched Chris's video on Tax Payment thru CardUp. May I know if my plan below works?Background:-I always wanted to open an UOB One Account but couldn't fulfill the monthly $500 credit card spending consistently.-I am currently using OCBC 360 (with GIRO salary crediting)-I am currently holding UOB Stash account under Rising Dragon Promotion (the earmarked amount should be released by 18th May 2024).My Plan:-Open a UOB One account now.-Apply UOB Evol Card now.-Setup CardUp tax payment arrangement with UOB Evol Card before 24th May 2024.-Transfer $150 000 (from UOB Stash Account) on 1st June 2024.-Fulfill the monthly salary crediting requirement thru FAST/PAYNOW from my DBS personal account from June onwards.-Fulfill the monthly credit card spending requirement thru UOB Evol Card for tax payment via CardUp monthly from June onwards.Question:1) Does my plan makes sense? (UOB Evol + CardUp to fulfill UOB One Credit Card spending and FAST payment from DBS personal account to fulfill Salary Crediting requirement)2) I just searched Cardup inHeymax.ai  seems like UOB Evol Card is eligible for 8% cashback. Is CardUp considered online spending with $20 cashback cap for CardUp spending ($600)? While the CardUp fee for $600 is less than $20.3) To fulfill the credit card spending in June  should I setup CardUp tax arrangement on 24th May or 24th June? If I setup the arrangement on 24th May  when will CardUp charge my card?Thanks!
